data.message:
Whenever I check my notifs, i go back to my news feed and then they come back again like they were never seen.

Example: I got 10 notifs. I check everyone, and then go back to my news feed. Then maybe 5 secs. later the notification counter pops up again saying I got 10 'new' notifs. Please fix this

replies.message: Hey, Leeroi. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This sounds like a feature issue. Please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2i4BAWB. -Rhea
